### Current job

I am a Postdoc at iDiv, the German Center for Integrative Biodiversity Research (Halle-Jena-Leipzig) in the [sDiv Synthesis Center](https://www.idiv.de/en/sdiv.html).

I am generally interested in population biology, which I have studies from the context of Ecology, Genetic and Conservation.

My current project at sDiv makes use of publicly available microsatellite genotypes of vertebrates to investigate worldwide patterns in genetic diversity, across Latitudes and life-history strategies
:::
